item.title: Perfect Compiler 1,8
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I guess this is good, but in Mod Taharok’s compiler it searches for your version of JDK and other things. This is just runserver+compiler.
You could make it shorter, like this :

@echo off title Servername Compiler javac *.java title Servername Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

P.S. USE A CODE BOX.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect Compiler 1,8
item.dc:creator: @Pure_pk1 Puré_pk
item.description:
@Pure_pk1 wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Perfect compiler 1,8 by mikkel (puré_pk)[/glow]

CLS

@COLOR 04
@Title Perfect compiler 1.8
@ECHO
@ECHO By Mikkel
@ECHO ----
@ECHO Copyrighted 2006-2007
@ECHO ----
@ECHO Type 1 Then Enter To RunServer.
@ECHO Type 2 Then Enter To Compile.
@ECHO Type 3 Then Enter To Restart Server.
@ECHO Type 4 Then Enter To Restart+Compile.
@ECHO Type 5 Then Enter To Exit.
@SET option=
@ECHO off
SET /p option=What Do You Choose?
if %option%==1 goto runclient
if %option%==2 goto compile
if %option%==3 goto restartserver
if %option%==4 goto randc
if %option%==5 goto exit
:compile
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Perfect Compiler 1,8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 1.8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Mikkelkulk!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
title Demonscape Compiler
javac *.java
pause
CLS
goto info
:runclient
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Demonscape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 3!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!rshadow!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
title Demonscape v3
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:restartserver
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Perfect Compiler 1.8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 1.8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Mikkelkulk!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
tskill java /a
@echo Exiting Other RunServer And Restarting…
title Knightscape V3
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:randc
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Perfect Compiler 1,8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 1,8!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Mikkelkulk!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
tskill java /a
@echo Exiting Other RunServer And Compiling…
title WhoGivesAScape
“G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“G:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause

CLS
goto info

PLEASE FEEDBACK!!

PS: YOU SHALL CHANGE THE COMPILER TO YOURS!!
